Package com.irurueta.ar.sfm

Interface SlamSparseReconstructorListener

All Superinterfaces:
BaseSlamSparseReconstructorListener<SlamSparseReconstructor>, BaseSparseReconstructorListener<SlamSparseReconstructor>
public interface SlamSparseReconstructorListener extends BaseSlamSparseReconstructorListener<SlamSparseReconstructor>
Listener to retrieve and store required data to compute a 3D reconstruction from sparse image point correspondences in multiple views and using SLAM for scale estimation.
